com.beowulfe.hap.accessories

Interface DimmableLightbulb

  • All Superinterfaces:
    HomekitAccessory, Lightbulb

    public interface DimmableLightbulb
extends Lightbulb
    Extends Lightbulb with brightness values.
    Author:
    Andy Lintner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<Integer> getBrightness()
      Retrieves the current brightness of the light
      CompletableFuture<Void> setBrightness(Integer value)
      Sets the current brightness of the light
      void subscribeBrightness(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
      Subscribes to changes in the brightness of the light.
      void unsubscribeBrightness()
      Unsubscribes from changes in the brightness of the light.

      • Methods inherited from interface com.beowulfe.hap.accessories.Lightbulb

        getLightbulbPowerState, getServices, setLightbulbPowerState, subscribeLightbulbPowerState, unsubscribeLightbulbPowerState

      • Methods inherited from interface com.beowulfe.hap.HomekitAccessory

        getId, getLabel, getManufacturer, getModel, getSerialNumber, identify

    • Method Detail

      • getBrightness

        CompletableFuture<Integer> getBrightness()
        Retrieves the current brightness of the light
        Returns:
        a future that will contain the brightness, expressed as an integer between 0 and 100.

      • setBrightness

        CompletableFuture<Void> setBrightness(Integer value)
                               throws Exception
        Sets the current brightness of the light
        Parameters:
        value - the brightness, on a scale of 0 to 100, to set
        Returns:
        a future that completes when the brightness is changed
        Throws:
        Exception - when the brightness cannot be set

      • subscribeBrightness

        void subscribeBrightness(HomekitCharacteristicChangeCallback callback)
        Subscribes to changes in the brightness of the light.
        Parameters:
        callback - the function to call when the state changes.

      • unsubscribeBrightness

        void unsubscribeBrightness()
        Unsubscribes from changes in the brightness of the light.
